column1: (3) hopefully it goes through I set up my account and my phone number I thought everything went through and I'd get my tax return but it wasn't until months after I realized it was rejected so I had to have the irs send me the info and had to wait for them because I don't have credit and couldnt get it through email but other than that if it all works out hopefully I'll have my refund I usually take my taxes to somebody so I didn't have all the info and after a long time I realized it didn't go through

(1) What happened??? I wondered whatever happened to my refund and finally got the information I needed to check the status. I found out both Federal and State were rejected and there was never an notification received stating this. Very poor communication Turbo Tax!! Never notified me my refund was REJECTED
(3) Dont know why it cost me double I dont know why it cost mw double the amount it said it would cost Cost me double
(3) Dont know why it cost me double I dont know why it cost mw double the amount it said it would cost Cost me double
